title: Newgrounds and The Golden Age of Flash Animation

media:group.media:title: Newgrounds and The Golden Age of Flash Animation
media:group.media:description:
A nostalgia-filled retrospective on Newgrounds, one of the most revolutionary websites in the history of the Internet. Ft. Interview with Salad Fingers creator David Firth 

Corrections:
- Studio Yotta was founded by Jake Ganz, not The SuperFlashBros
